aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-6614-523 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 21/08/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 22/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 23/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
